name: MyCardoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, open My Card of the Day”
”Alexa, start My Card of the Day”
”Alexa, launch My Card of the Day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my card of the day
Developer Terms of Use
des:
My Card of the Day is a skill that allows Alexa to pick a card to give you some guidance for your day. 

Do you need inspiration? Do you need guidance about the energy surrounding you? Do you need some advice about what's ahead? These cards will tell you what you need! 

Ask for as many as you need. My Card of the Day is here for you.

Just say, "Alexa, open My Card of the Day."
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
